Title: Woodland - Antelope Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the landscapes and wildlife of vast savannahs, the beautiful Woodland collection is sure to whisk away the imagination – it's adventurous with a luxurious twist. The beautiful Antelope area rug from Erin Gates by Momeni features an all-over animal print in sophisticated on-trend hues, ready to decorate your most comfortable interior placements.

  • Erin Gates is an accomplished interior designer and a celebrated blogger whose love for playful pattern is reflected beautifully in this exciting Momeni collaboration.
  • Antelope is a dreamy animal print area rug that features a speckled all-over pattern spangled over a silvery ombre transition. Use this piece to complement your most whimsical spaces, ranging from quiet bedrooms to charming nurseries and cozy reading nooks.
  • Woodland is a beautiful 100% wool area rug that has been hand-tufted by skilled artisans, the pile cut to a medium height for a plush underfoot experience. This piece is family-friendly and pet-friendly for lasting appeal in active home environments.
  • Some shedding is to be expected with all new wool area rugs. This will subside with regular vacuuming. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

With traditional and bohemian elements inspired by Persian and Moroccan designs, our Erin Gates by Momeni Concord CRD-1 area rug adds classic good looks to go with its soft wool construction.

  • Every rug is knotted by hand, giving these rugs incredible texture underfoot as well as much-needed durability.
  • This piece features an antique-inspired look, Persian motifs, and washed tones for an inviting appearance in your entryway, dining room, or living area.
  • Hand-knotted from natural wool fibers, this indoor rug offers amazing softness and a textural fringe.
  • Consistent vacuuming every week is the easiest way to maintain a healthy rug with strong fibers.
  • Made in India.

Title: Chestnut - Stripe Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The beauty of natural jute is showcased and celebrated with the Chestnut Stripe area rug from Erin Gates by Momeni. This adaptable interior accent offers a rich tonal palette that opens the door for creative coordination possibilities, making this piece an effective grounding element with endless decorative potential.

  • Erin Gates is an accomplished interior designer and blogger whose expertise with patterns makes this Momeni collaboration especially exciting.
  • Texture sets this sophisticated striped area rug apart from the rest. Each stripe is composed of long jute yarns in tidy bundles, resulting in especially crisp lines throughout. Choose from two earthy colorways.
  • Chestnut Stripe is a 100% jute area rug that has been handwoven by skilled artisans for artful appeal. The flatwoven construction is fully reversible for twice the wear, lightweight for easier upkeep and handling.
  • Place in a dry and stable environment. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Crescent - Broken Stripe Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Natural materials meet modern styling with the perfectly chic Crescent Broken Stripe area rug from the expert designers at Momeni. This exciting interior accent is handcrafted by skilled artisans using soft natural fibers that beckon the touch, sure to make any space feel warmer and more inviting from the very first glance.

  • The timeless broken stripe aesthetic puts a playful spin on a classic. Choose from two colorways – one that goes bold with contrast and one that keeps things light.
  • Broken Stripe is an especially adaptable contemporary rug that can be dressed up or dressed down to suit the decor that surrounds. Use to underscore a formal dining table, to tie together a casual living space, or anywhere in between.
  • Crescent collection area rugs are handwoven by skilled Momeni artisans using premium 100% jute spun into super soft yarns. This jute rug maintains a low profile for lightweight handling without sacrificing an ounce of resilience.
  • Place in a dry environment. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Natural materials meet modern styling with the perfectly chic Crescent Broken Stripe area rug from the expert designers at Momeni. This exciting interior accent is handcrafted by skilled artisans using soft natural fibers that beckon the touch, sure to make any space feel warmer and more inviting from the very first glance.

  • The timeless broken stripe aesthetic puts a playful spin on a classic. Choose from two colorways – one that goes bold with contrast and one that keeps things light.
  • Broken Stripe is an especially adaptable contemporary rug that can be dressed up or dressed down to suit the decor that surrounds. Use to underscore a formal dining table, to tie together a casual living space, or anywhere in between.
  • Crescent collection area rugs are handwoven by skilled Momeni artisans using premium 100% jute spun into super soft yarns. This jute rug maintains a low profile for lightweight handling without sacrificing an ounce of resilience.
  • Place in a dry environment. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Title: Richmond - Collins Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add movement and texture to your contemporary space with the incredibly versatile Richmond Collins Area Rug by Momeni.

  • Boasting soft, neutral striations of ivory and gray, this exquisitely modern area rug is as sleek as it is cozy. The textured design makes for a dynamic centerpiece that works as well in casual spaces as it does in sophisticated, well-appointed rooms.
  • This flat pile area rug brings your space a comfortable surface while remaining kid- and pet-friendly, making it an ideal choice for any high traffic area. The jute and wool area rug boasts a resilient, durable construction that's made to stand the test of time.
  • This carefully-crafted area rug is handwoven in India.
  • This rug should be spot cleaned and vacuumed on low. Professional cleaning is recommended, and we advise against using a vacuum beater bar on this elegant rug.

Title: Langdon - Windsor Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Introduce a sense of comfortable calm to your favorite room with this decorative Windsor area rug from the Langdon collection by Erin Gates and Momeni. This collection conveys an on-trend aesthetic with versatile colorways, perfect for today's homes.

  • The Windsor area rug features an optical diamond and Swiss dot pattern with eye-catching texture and soft wool fibers. It is available in pastel colorways designed for soft sensibility.
  • Handwoven from natural wool fibers, this 1/4" area rug is precision-made for years of enjoyment. A quality rug pad is recommended.
  • This area rug is made from wool and will last longer in low to moderate traffic zones.
  • Clean your rug using a gentle wool detergent to protect the natural fibers and vacuum regularly with the beater bar off.

Title: River - Holden Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create dimension and depth in your contemporary home with the River Holden Area Rug from the Erin Gates Collection for Momeni.

  • Promising gorgeous, hand-woven details, this stylish indoor/outdoor area rug is expertly crafted in India.

  • Made for indoor or outdoor use, this 100% PET area rug is incredibly durable. Whether you use this flat pile area rug on your patio, in your living room, or in your dining room, it's sure to withstand the daily spills and foot traffic your busy life throws its way.
  • To clean soft drinks off of your rug, blot any surplus spillage before cleaning the stain with a detergent solution, followed by an ammonia solution.
